text: Ani jevha tyanna sangitale gele ki tyavara imana rakha je allahane avatarita kele ahe, tevha te mhanale ki je amacyavara (taurata) utaravile gele, tyavara amace imana ahe ani te tyala soduna dusarya granthaca (pavitra kura'anaca) inkara karatata. Vastavika to satya ahe. Tyancyajavala asalelya (dharmagrantha) ci satyata sid'dha karita ahe. (He paigambara!) Tyanna sanga ki jara tumhi apalya granthavara imana rakhata tara yapurvi allahacya paigambaranci hatya ka keli
